XenotypeDef.label: Ghoul
XenotypeDef.description: Ghouls are humans who have been heavily irradiated, causing their flesh to rot and their appearance to become corpse-like, but granting them remarkable resistance to radiation and toxins. Though often shunned for their looks, ghouls are tough survivors, able to endure environments that would kill most others.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: A human mutated by radiation, immune to toxins and capable of surviving in the harshest environments.

XenotypeDef.label: Glowing One
XenotypeDef.description: Glowing Ones are rare ghouls whose bodies emit a radioactive glow. Their intense radiation heals other ghouls and harms the living, making them both feared and revered among their kind. Exposure to extreme radiation has granted them powerful regenerative abilities, but further alienated them from humanity.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: A highly irradiated ghoul that emits radiation, healing other ghouls and damaging the living.
